title: [SD] Enhance SD-WAN/LAN/WIFI Product Model for MIST Q2
description:
Business Scope:
A ´product- and production model is requested for different IT systems in DT. A Model for Juniper SD-WAN already exists and must be enhanced with LAN/WiFi. The PO/PS level will be provided by Offering Management (BO). Basis for the production model shall be the module catalogue of the existing TDG product “mLan”.
acceptance_criteria: Product and production model for LAN & WIFI
